title: Mansa Musa Ain't Got Nothing On Me: The Unati Story
itunes:title: Mansa Musa Ain't Got Nothing On Me: The Unati Story
description:
This episode Unati guides us through her process for planning a session whilst the group tries to hold it together, it's a funny one ... well, at least we think it is.  


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com


Don't know Mansa Musa check this out, the guy was rich! (just not as rich as Unati)

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-africa-47379458

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
